name: On The Struggle Bus
description:
Welcome to On The Struggle Bus by TPG Studios

In this game, we are approaching the classic childhood experience of riding the school bus but from a new perspective – the bus driver’s.

You'll be playing as Herbert,

A stressed bus driver just trying to do his job and get the kids on his bus to school safely and on time, even if they seem to have other ideas… 

Never played before? Check out our tutorial level! Here is a quick preview of what to expect! The "All-in-One Child Management Dashboard System"

Gives Herbert a way to keep the children under control. As you continue to unlock levels, new buttons, and features can be earned to help Herbert along the way. 

Feeling like a completionist? Complete all the challenges and earn achievements!
